allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add YouTube Channel Automation feature with Supabase integration

Major Features:
- YouTube channel processing: Auto-fetch top 6 videos (>10 min, sorted by views)
- Supabase database integration for API keys, video tracking, and counters
- Multi-chat support (Aman & Anu chats)
- API key rotation (Supadata keys auto-rotate on exhaustion)
- 15-day video cooldown to prevent duplicates
- Global counter for audio file naming (1_raw.wav, 2_raw.wav, etc.)
- 7000-char chunking with DeepSeek processing
- Complete pipeline: Transcript â†’ Chunking â†’ DeepSeek â†’ F5-TTS â†’ Gofile

New Modules:
- supabase_client.py: Database operations and API key management
- transcribe_helper.py: Supadata API integration with job polling
- youtube_processor.py: YouTube Data API v3 integration

New Commands:
- /set_supabase_url, /set_supabase_key
- /set_youtube_key, /add_supadata_key, /set_deepseek_key
- /set_channel_prompt, /list_keys

Dependencies Added:
- supabase>=2.0.0, httpx>=0.24.0, isodate>=0.6.1
